lines.text: Guys who play dirty, end up getting hurt.
Let's call it a day, Luis.
One of us is gonna die today and it ain't gonna be me.
This is far from over, Sam. Far from over.
You're wrong, Ryan. This is completely over.

[Narrating]
Justice. That's what the legal system is supposed to be about. But it's not. It's about money, about corruption. I thought I've loved this kind of thing in my past with Luis Calderone. But I haven't. And Calderone is closing in on me like a freight train.
You're screwed, Ryan, you're screwed. You stepped right over the line. Of course, I knew you would and I always knew I would be there when you did. You're screwed.
Okay, I'm screwed. You're repeating yourself.
